inclusion.criterion: Diagnosed with both Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD) and Obstructive Sleep Apnea (OSA)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Prescription for positive airway pressure therapy (PAP). There should be no minimum or maximum flow required.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Access to the internet via a PC, tablet, or smart phone to complete all study activities from home or remotely
inclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has multifactorial chronic hypoxemia and dyspnea thought due to diastolic CHF, pulmonary hypertension thought secondary to a chronic ASD and COPD on 5L home oxygen. Patient tolerated an inpatient sildenafil trial without hypotension.
